No, JP, that was not a mode. Kinger got my permission several times, 
and cleared it with me every step of the way. You've escaped damage 
for Megatron waaay to often (ie. not even responding when War, Famine, 
and Pestilance self-destructed all around him), and this will not be 
one of those times. 

Rewrite that post, taking into account everything in Kinger's, or 
you're the one that's moding. Megatron is your character to post 
damage for, but remember that the whole area was completely 
incinirated, so geting blown out harmlessly is not an option. 
Personally, I don't see a way for any bot involved to get out of this 
alive.

The post you just wrote is void. Please rewrite it.
